definition: to separate/to partition/to stand or lie between/at a distance from/after or at an interval of

sentences.english: Daily or weekly scans can be scheduled also.
sentences.chinese: 也可以設定隔天或隔週掃描。

sentences.english: "ketut, why is life all crazy like this?" I asked my medicine man the next day.
sentences.chinese: “賴爺，人生何以如此瘋狂？”隔天我問我的藥師。

sentences.english: The next morning, the mayor of the city is walking near the statue.
sentences.chinese: 隔天早上，市長正好從這尊像附近走過。

sentences.english: The next morning, Maria and Janet woke up and took a look around the cabin.
sentences.chinese: 隔天早上，瑪麗亞和珍娜醒來後環視屋子四周。

sentences.english: Sure enough, the next day wu mei niang will release the gold is still palace.
sentences.chinese: 果不其然，隔天武媚娘便釋放了金尚宮。

sentences.english: The next morning Cassim went to his brother.
sentences.chinese: 隔天早上凱辛跑去找他弟弟。

sentences.english: All the next day we loaded our ship to the full.
sentences.chinese: 隔天一整天我們將船載滿了貨物。

sentences.english: The next day, cheng bite gold etc are counsel how to take over the unique to the site.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，程咬金等人正在商議如何接管瞿讓的地盤。

sentences.english: He sent patients for treatment each day and bathed them every other day.
sentences.chinese: 他每天護送病人接受治療，隔天給他們洗澡。

sentences.english: The next day Hamlet' s ship was attacked by pirates.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，哈姆雷特的船遭到海盜的攻擊。

sentences.english: The next morning, Pinocchio walked to school with his brand-new notebook.
sentences.chinese: 隔天早上，皮諾奇帶着全新的筆記簿走路上學。

sentences.english: One day later, Liverpool was away at arch-rival Manchester United.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，利物浦對上世仇，曼徹斯特聯隊。

sentences.english: The next day, Danfu with his family left the country.
sentences.chinese: 隔天，亶父就攜家帶眷地離開了邠國。

sentences.english: After drinking lie between a day very afflictive , how should do?
sentences.chinese: 喝酒後的隔天很難受，該怎麼辦呢？

sentences.english: I stay up late studying every night so I always oversleep the next morning.
sentences.chinese: 我每晚都熬夜唸書，所以隔天早上總是睡過了頭。

sentences.english: In addition, vehicles in Beijing will face alternate-day driving restrictions.
sentences.chinese: 此外，北京的車輛將面臨隔天限行。

definition: at dawn/at first light/first thing in the morning
first thing in the morning/at daybreak
